description: Retrieve the image ID of an image whose metadata is pushed to an HCP Packer registry. The image ID is that of the HCP Packer bucket iteration assigned to the configured channel, with a matching cloud provider and region.
name: packer

optionalSourceFields.Synopsis: The OAuth2 Client ID for HCP API operations.
The OAuth2 Client Secret for HCP API operations.

requiredFields.Synopsis: The name of the HCP Packer bucket from which to source an image.
The name of the HCP Packer channel from which to source the latest image.
The cloud provider of the machine image to source
The region set for the machine image's cloud provider.

sourceFieldsHelp:
Source Parameters
The parameters below are used with `waypoint config source-set` to configure
the behavior this plugin. These are _not_ used in `dynamic` calls. The
parameters used for `dynamic` are in the previous section.
